message: Week 3 and Week 4 JSON files created successfully with enhanced question format

week3_details.title: Learning
week3_details.topics: Classical conditioning (Pavlov, Watson, Jones), Operant conditioning (Thorndike, Skinner), Cognitive approaches (Tolman, Köhler), Learned helplessness
week3_details.enhanced_format: All questions include difficulty, full explanations for correct answers, and detailed explanations for each incorrect option

week4_details.title: Motivation
week4_details.topics: Drive theory, Instinct theory, Arousal theory, Expectancy-value theory, Intrinsic-extrinsic motivation, Achievement motivation (McClelland)
week4_details.enhanced_format: All questions include difficulty, full explanations for correct answers, and detailed explanations for each incorrect option
